question: Show takeaway descriptions and prepared meal descriptions with a best before date of 10.11.2018.
sql_query1:
SELECT Meals.Description 
FROM Meals
WHERE (Meals.MealType = "Prepared Meal" OR Meals.MealType = "Takeaway") AND Meals.BestBefore = "10.11.2018"
sql_query2:
SELECT Meals.Description 
FROM Meals
WHERE Meals.MealType = "Prepared Meal" OR Meals.MealType = "Takeaway" AND Meals.BestBefore = "10.11.2018"
interpretation1: Which takeaway meal descriptions have a best before date of 10.11.2018 and which prepared meal descriptions have the same best before date?
interpretation2: Provide a list of takeaway meal descriptions with any best before date as well as prepared meal descriptions with a best before date of 10.11.2018.
